name: Knight of Fury, Agravain
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put all of your rear-guards into your soul], look at the same number of cards from the top of your deck as the number of rear-guards you called this turn, call any number from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 12], and until end of this fight, your opponent can only call normal units. (Includes superior calls)

name: Holy Great Sage of Black Shadows, Isabelle
effect:
[CONT](VC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you perform both of the effects for "perform one of the effects".
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], put the top card of your deck into the drop zone, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.
・Normal Unit - This unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
・Trigger Unit - Return the card put from your deck into the drop zone by this effect to your hand.

name: Arboros Dragon, Sephirot
effect:
[CONT](VC):The plant tokens you call are called as grade 0/[Power] 10000/[Shield] 10000/[Critical] 1, and have "Boost" and "Intercept".
[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Retire a rear-guard], call up to two plant tokens to (RC), and if you have five or more rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Liberator of the Flute, Escrad
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, if your vanguard is "Knight of Fury, Agravain" or "Liberator of the Flute, Escrad", look at the top card of your deck, call it to (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Little Battler, Tron
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, if your vanguard's grade is less than or equal to your opponent's, look at the top card of your deck, and call it to (RC).

name: Scientist of Black Sheen, Mathilda
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], put the top card of your deck into the drop zone, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.
・Normal Unit - Until end of turn, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC) for the battle this unit attacked, he or she must call two or more at the same time.
・Trigger Unit - This unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Prober of Black Jet, Cecile
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], put the top card of your deck into the drop zone, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.
・Normal Unit - [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
・Trigger Unit - Draw two cards, and discard two cards from your hand.

name: Peony Musketeer, Martina
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Retire a rear-guard], look at five cards from the top of your deck, call one card from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](RC):During the turn it was placed from the deck, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1.

name: Peony Musketeer, Toure
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire a rear-guard], look at three cards from the top of your deck, call two cards with "Musketeer" in their card names or any one card from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Full Cavalier Dragon
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, call it to (RC), and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Knight of Hard-work, Alienor
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, perform all of the effects below according to the number of rear-guards you called this turn.
・2 or more - This unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
・4 or more - Then, you may have it get [Power] +10000. If you do, at the end of that battle, put this unit into your soul.

name: Knight of Sound Health, Cunedagius
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When it boosts, if your vanguard is "Knight of Fury, Agravain", perform all of the effects below according to the number of rear-guards you called this turn.
・2 or more - The boosted unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.
・4 or more - That unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle

name: Daring Scientist, Marimarten
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], put the top card of your deck into the drop zone, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.
・Normal Unit - Your opponent cannot intercept until end of turn.
・Trigger Unit - Retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit.

name: Hammsuke's Rival, Rocket Pencil Hammdon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit is placed on an additional (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a card from your hand into the soul], and that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have two or more additional (RC), draw a card.

name: Hammsuke's Rival, Red-and-Blue Pencil Hammhiko
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at two cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your hand, and put one card from among them into the drop zone.
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your card is put from the deck into the drop zone, you may have this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Fruits Assort Dragon
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, increase this unit's [Power] by the sum of the original [Power] of all of your grade 0 rear-guards.

name: Arboros Dragon, Timber
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, the next plant token you call this turn is called as grade 0/[Power] 10000/[Shield] 10000/[Critical] 1, and has "Boost" and "Intercept".
[AUTO](RC):When placed, you may call a plant token to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)

name: Arboros Dragon, Branch
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When its attack or the attack it boosted hits, you may look at four cards from the top of your deck. If you do, reveal up to one card with "Arboros" in its card name from among them and put it into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Knight of Unison, Uzelle
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):At the beginning of your main phase, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each of your rear-guards.

name: Providential Angel
effect: [ACT](RC):If your hand has one or less cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], until end of turn, your opponent can only call a total of one sentinel from hand, and this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Knight of Phosphorescence, Langlee
effect:
[CONT](RC):It gets all of the effects below according to the number of rear-guards you called this turn.
・2 or more - Your opponent cannot intercept.
・4 or more - This unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Knight of Virtuous Intellect, Gunhild
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your hand has one or less cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 and "Intercept", and can intercept from the back row.

name: Repulse Rod Angel
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Culture Gorilla
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 5], and [Stand] all of your [Power] 25000 or greater rear-guards. If you [Stand] two or more, retire all of your opponent's rear-guards.

name: Observation Scribe, Snaquill
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard attacks, if your card was put from the deck into the drop zone this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Scale Toucan
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and return one of your other rear-guards to your hand.
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your card is put from the deck into the drop zone, you may have this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Hearty Academic, Anteate
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Dry Cell Rabbit
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your card is put from the deck into the drop zone, if this unit is on an additional (RC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Gale of Arboros, Oliver
effect:
[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:If your soul has two or more cards with "Arboros" in their card names, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and resolve one of effects below.
・Call two plant tokens to (RC).
・[COST][Retire two rear-guards], and this unit gets [Power] +20000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Moral Enlightenment Maiden, Melya
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Retire any number of plant tokens], and until end of turn, increase this unit's [Power] by the sum of the original [Power] of the units retired for this cost.

name: Grain Sprout Maiden, Enifa
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):Your plant tokens in the same column as this unit or on (GC) cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects, and get [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000.

name: Lamplight of Allegiance, Yohna
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 2], and until end of turn, increase the [Power] of two of your other grade 1 or less units by those units' original [Power] .

name: Amimelo Melon
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Lonegal
effect: [CONT]:You cannot ride this card. (Includes superior rides)

name: Demonic Crystal Mobilization, Coiras
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, if your hand has one or less cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and until end of turn, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +10000.

name: Cloudwing Eagle
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When your other unit is placed, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Activates when guardians are placed)

name: Knight of Resolution, Bethoc
effect:
[CONT](RC):This unit gets all of the effects below according to the number of rear-guards you called this turn.
・2 or more - This unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Interlude Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed by a card ability, [COST][put this unit into your soul], look at the top card of your deck, and call it to (RC).

effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Elixir Sommelier
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)

effect: [ACT](Drop zone):[COST][Bind this unit], and put up to two normal units from your drop zone on the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Solution Tenrec
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle it attacked, if your drop zone has twenty-five or more cards and this unit is on an additional (RC), your opponent cannot call grade 0 cards from hand to (GC).
